page.title: 07KERSEY
page.content: There are several buses which go through Kersey.They are private bus companies which run a service to Ipswch,Sproughton,Burstall,Flowton, Hadleigh,Elmsett,Aldham and Whatfield. On the other route they travel to Lavenham,Hadleigh and Ipswich. The Church of ST.Mary is called a "wool" church because it was improved and decorated in the fourteenth and fifthteenth centuries with money from the wool trade. It is made of flint and some limestone.One of the windows has been filled in and there were at least fifteen statues on the Church. These were probably destroyed in Cromwells time.
